results.description: Use news_pct_10min and news_atr14 to capture immediate momentum after news scaled by volatility. Applied SUGGESTION1 (2 datafields used). Divide news_pct_30min by ts_mean(news_tot_ticks,10) to find strong moves relative to tick density. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 applied. Coverage high. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence: 0.58.

results.idea: Pre-open gap amplified by high vol ratio
results.description: Multiply news_open_gap by news_ratio_vol to identify big gaps with volume backing. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 applied. Coverage good. KEEP_IN_MINDs respected. Confidence: 0.60.
Reverse multiply news_short_interest by news_pct_60min to fade moves when short-interest is high (crowded). SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 applied. Coverage high. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence: 0.53.
Divide news_eps_actual by news_tot_ticks to find large earnings in low-activity names. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 applied. Coverage good. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence: 0.62.

results.idea: Momentum persistence normalized by 30-day moving vol
results.description: Divide news_pct_30min by news_mov_vol to favor moves exceeding average liquidity. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 applied. Coverage good. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence: 0.59.

results.idea: Immediate continuation when eod high aligns with max up ret
results.description: Multiply news_max_up_ret by sign(subtract(news_eod_high, news_ton_last)) to favor consistent direction. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. KEEP_IN_MINDs concise. Confidence: 0.57.
Multiply news_vol_stddev and news_ratio_vol to detect unusual volume volatility confirming moves. SUGGESTION1 and SUGGESTION4 applied. Coverage high. KEEP_IN_MINDs respected. Confidence: 0.60.

results.idea: Micro-mean reversion using 1-min pct and 5-min avg
results.description: Subtract news_pct_1min from ts_mean(news_pct_5_min,5) and reverse to find micro reversion. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage good. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence: 0.56.

results.idea: Continuation when eod vwap above prevwap and volume rising
results.description: Multiply sign(subtract(news_post_vwap, news_prevwap)) with news_curr_vol to detect VWAP-driven continuation. news_prevwap coverage low (~0.3806) so ts_backfill applied. SUGGESTION3 used. SUGGESTION1 applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs observed. Confidence: 0.49.

results.idea: Post-news volatility breakout confirmed by eod move
results.description: Multiply news_atr_ratio and news_pct_90min to find sustained volatility breakouts. SUGGESTION1 applied. Both fields coverage high. KEEP_IN_MINDs respected. Confidence: 0.61.

results.idea: Intraday strength normalized by market index move
results.description: Divide news_pct_10min by add(1, abs(news_indx_perf)) to favor idiosyncratic strength. SUGGESTION1 applied. Coverage high. KEEP_IN_MINDs concise. Confidence: 0.58.
Multiply news_pct_5_min and inverse(news_mov_vol) to capture explosive low-liquidity moves. SUGGESTION1 & SUGGESTION4 applied. Coverage good. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept. Confidence: 0.55.
